com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller

Class BrightcoveControlBarImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.brightcove.player.mediacontroller.BrightcoveControlBarImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, BrightcoveControlBar, ShowHideController

    public class BrightcoveControlBarImpl
extends android.widget.LinearLayout
implements BrightcoveControlBar
    Provides a class to contain and manage the objects generally referred to as media player controls: the set of buttons controlling the video experience, the seek bar, and the text views showing current progress and video duration. These components are defined in an XML layout. The implementation is loosely based on the BCC Tina project with major contributions from Kate Kelly and Tim Parsons.
